scripts.build:senior: cd senior && npx graph codegen && npx graph build
scripts.build:junior: cd junior && npx graph codegen && npx graph build
scripts.build:reserve: cd reserve && npx graph codegen && npx graph build
scripts.deploy:senior: cd senior && goldsky subgraph deploy liquid-royalty-senior/v2.0.0 --path .
scripts.deploy:junior: cd junior && goldsky subgraph deploy liquid-royalty-junior/v2.0.0 --path .
scripts.deploy:reserve: cd reserve && goldsky subgraph deploy liquid-royalty-reserve/v2.0.0 --path .
